issue.title: [Docs] Describe use of Jira Affects Version in Contributing docs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12634](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12634). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Update the [**Contributing to Apache Arrow**](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/docs/source/developers/contributing.rst) page to describe the preferred way to use **Affects Version** in Jira, as described in this email to the dev list: <https://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/arrow-dev/202104.mbox/%3cCABCGCVfqQgqrh1bGpzhK5no+_KYm1ctvYvs2ajJ_by-8=VRmqA@mail.gmail.com%3e>
